fields.name: Random Pat-Downs (2x, Charge 75%):
fields.value: Receive a random list of living players based on your score. Target two; their attack power (if any) will be reduced by 0.2x, or to 0.5x, whichever is lower.

fields.name: Security Theater (1x, Charge 150%):
fields.value: Astrally roleblock anyone with attack power greater than 0.0x. However, the next night, all Town members' defense power will be reduced by 0.2x. This ability cannot be successfully used two nights in a row.

fields.name: Appoint Air Marshal (2x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked if you place in the top 3. Use during the evening phase. Your target will be roleblocked for one night (while completing government training requirements) and then gain a one-time attack with 1.4x attack power. No ammo is spent if your target dies this night.
